description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              JOB INFORMATION:
              
              •	Full-time/ part-time: Full time
              
              •	Work at: Hanoi
              

              JOB DESCRIPTION
              
              •	We need 2 people for Online Sales
              
              •	Develop the potential market and promote products to clients
              
              •	Directly sell tailor-made package tours to English speaking customers.
              
              •	Provide literature and information to clients concerning local, interstate and international tours, travel routes, accommodation, local customs, fares and travel regulations
              
              •	Discuss with clients about their requirements and advise the suitable options
              
              •	Prepare and submit tailor-make inbound travel itineraries including of creating detailed programs and price proposals
              
              •	Guide prospective clients and entice them to confirm the booking
              
              •	Confirm the program order and notify clients of compulsory information / documents (luggage limits, insurance, medical, passport, visa and currency requirements)
              
              •	Maintain and develop a good relationships with existing customers (individuals and groups)
              
              •	Handle and reply to any comments or complaints after discussing with the manager (if any)
              
              •	Inform quickly the Department Manager in case of real problems, allowing a suitable solution
              
              •	Following up and take care of the clients during their travel program arranged
              
              •	Make sales report and feedback to Board of Director monthly
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Degree: Bachelors & at least 1 or 2-year experience in tourism field with the same position
              
              •	Fluent verbal & written communication skills in both English & Vietnamese
              
              •	Be able to work under pressure, time limit.
              
              •	Be able to provide good services to your clients. Meaning: fast, clear, professional, straight-to-the-point answer.
              
              •	Be able to work as a team; voluntarily help your departmental co-workers.
              
              •	Be able to give good, well-qualified travel advice to clients.
              
              •	Good office skills and office computer skills (MS Office Applications)
              

              BENEFIT
              
              •	Competitive salary and bonus based on work result.
              
              •	Social Insurance, Health insurance in accordance to Vietnamese Law of Labor.
              
              •	Annual Leave: 12 days /year.
              
              •	Opportunity for further training, inspection trips and professional exchanges with company's partners and vendors.
              
              •	Being assisted with the job at the beginning (No official training program)
              
              •	Fun and supportive working environment.
              
              •	Opportunities of travel
              

              HOW TO APPLY
              
              Please send your updated CV and Cover letter in English to HR Officer via VietnamWorks
              
              Application deadline: 31/07/2018
              
              Only shortlisted candidates are contacted for the interview
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
